summary: I NEVER GOT INFORMED ABOUT THIS SETTLEMENT CLAIM HTTP://SETTLEMENT-CLAIMS.COM/CONTROLARM/NOTICE.HTML 2 YEARS AGO.     HONDA SERVICE FIRST FOUND A PROBLEM ON REAR CONTROL ARMS AND TIRE WEAR ON MARCH 12TH.  WHY DIDN'T THEY NOTICE PROBLEM BEFORE MARCH 12TH?      HONDA SERVICE GAVE ME A PRICE OF PARTS AND LABOR.  IT'S $255 ON PARTS (CONTROL ARMS) AND $150 LABOR.    UPDATED 12/21/2015*JS
